attributes.action: That the Monarch abdicates and all funding to the Royal Family abolished
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That the Queen abdicates and all funding to the Royal Family abolished, the replacement head of state being chosen in a compulsory raffle for convicted criminals each four years.Come on , this the twenty first centuary the royals should be working in supermarkets not opening them!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
